pages.text: The Reinforced variant let you build Reactors as big as you need or want, to generate and store extreme amounts of energy.$(br2)The maximum size, up to 256 blocks, can be set by players, mod packs makers or server admins in the config file of Extreme Reactors.

Reinforced Reactors pay they superior structural integrity by being a bit more expensive to craft and not as efficient as the other variants but nothing that their superior generation capacity can't overcome.
